review: The jacket is very stylish and modern. I would recommend sizing down one size. My husband is 5'9 180 with an athletic build and we had to exchange for S from a M.
Very nice! My little one looked like a little man. The fit was perfect not wide or short.

Unfortunately, my microfleece top didn't hold up in the washing machine. After only 2 washes the stitching along a part of the neck opening came undone. I was very disappointed because the top was very soft and comfortable to wear. I expected better from this brand. I ordered the black in one size larger than what I would usually wear based on other reviews re: sizing.

Amazing, clear, and good price. I've been shopping around for a decent-sized monitor for quite a while now. There are literally thousands to choose from, but I was working on a budget. This monitor came in to save the day. The box it comes in is really professional and neatly packed, it sets up really easily too. I do not regret the purchase at all.
Very nice and doesn't slide. Highly recommend
This was a bit overpriced, but it is high quality. But the arms and legs are very finicky.

I've had this watch for over a month now and I really wanted to love it because I love the design and a lot of the features. I never write reviews for products but I'm so disappointed in the heart rate monitor of this watch. I bought the watch mainly for tracking workouts and to upgrade from my old fitbit but its essentially useless as it frequently is off by 60+bpm for my HR and will say I'm 'relaxing' when my HR is really 160. Because of this, the calorie count is also completely inaccurate. I've tried adjusting the fit of the watch as well as where it rests on my wrist and none of this has made it more accurate.

This is getting returned ... it smells too similar to Nectar. It's like a mix between the OG and Nectar that I can't justify having Ruby Orchid. I've owned the first two and I was hoping this would be a little different.

I've had this couch for about 2 weeks now. I wanted to try it out and give an honest review. Its so beautiful and durable. I love that the cushion is very comfortable and yet durable. I dont think it will cave in any time soon. Soft velvet fabric used gives a soft feel. It arrived without any damages. It is actually a bigger couch than I initially thought. Do not hesitate to buy this you will not regret it. Assembly is very easy and takes less than 10 minutes. I would recommend this sofa based on looks as well as comfort.
Very solid product, on time, good value, and meets my need for a work monitor. Easy to set up. Would be slightly better if it were more adjustable, but all in all very pleased.

These pants were exactly what I was looking for. Medium length as I'm 5'4 and don't like pants at my ankles. You can dress these up or down. I love these and will definitely by more when I wear these out.
The fabric was super soft and the color combination was beautiful. This was a gift and the recipient loved the onesie.
I bought this last month but it has too much interference, and yes I checked all the devices connected.
Great shirt, my husband wears it as often as he can ever since I gifted it to him. Thanks for the great service and the great gift. Buy these - you will not regret it!

There are so many details on this top! It's very good quality, I love the black because it looks classy and perfect for a date night top this is actually COMFORTABLE!!! I'm wearing a medium which is my normal size.
Perfect monitor if you Know how to calibrate it! HDR isn't great though. Worth it once you calibrate with RGB color hues & saturation. So good many settings.

My husband purchased this coat & he loves it! He is 5'9 weighs 210lbs and he bought it in a Large. It's definitely true to size. Keeps him nice and warm! This coat is great in quality and it's exactly identical to the one modeled in the picture. Great buy!

Dress is too simple for the price. The sleeves is the only wow factor. Dress is true to size. Dress is all polyester. Dress is cute, but I found it to be very plain. Plain zipper in the back. Plain front. DKNY should have made it better quality. I do like the dress, but I think it's too simple for the price tag.

So I ordered two of these jackets, one for my husband and one for my father, for Christmas. It gives you that motorcycle flare with a mix of puffer jacket (not the trash bag material looking ones thank goodness!) and a sprinkle of Sherpa. My father and husband are in LOVE with their coats. My husband wears it almost everywhere now. Everything fits as it should and has good length to it.
The drone can only fly for 6 minutes ... this is way under my expectation, not to mention that you need to fully charge it for 60 minutes in order to do that.

Pretty impressed with the brightness and picture quality for something so small. Playing over wifi can be a little hit or miss depending on the quality of the video, but hooking it up to something direct works great. Only con I've found so far is the speaker's not great, and hooking it up to a speaker via the 3.5mm output doesn't always have great results either.

The color quality of this IPS monitor compared to my VA is WOW! The difference in the sharper image is crazy! I enjoy the playing Rainbow 6, Destiny 2 and CoD in 240 hz instead of 144 makes a difference! Overall a really solid product!
I bought this outfit a few weeeks ago and I love it, I'm so happy I did. The material is good quality and fits my kid very well.
Lovely and great quality, worth every penny I spent.

The rejuvenating facial spray with lavender and chamomile is the best. It feel so refreshing and gets those essential oil smells creating a calm self, the cleaning oil makes such smooth skin and best of all is the lip balm. I got it at a discounted rate which was well worth the money. Full price I would've found it to be not the best value but great products either way.

I LOVE this set! I have been waiting for years to order a really nice set of non-stick cookware and this has exceeded my expectations. They are heavy duty, you can tell they are not going to warp and I love the lids, so you can see what's cooking. Highly recommend!

I'm 2 days into using this regimen and I'm a fan! I feel moisturized all day. I just wish there was a mini SPF included as I like some protection- don't believe this has it from what I've seen. But, great kit!
My husband loves this pair of jeans. He likes them because they have a zipper. Levi jeans are very durable and never go out of style.
Fits perfectly size XL, looks great much better and fleshy than picture. Got a really sweet deal on it to. Highly recommend.
Was a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it. Bought a size large and it is true to size. Highly recommend.

This is an awesome shirt. I have worn it for 3-4 years now. If washing at home the color does run at first wash so do not wash the darker with your whites. Soak overnight and wash separate for your first wash.

When I first put it on, I wasn't sure what to think, but once I was dazzled up for my formal event with the dress on, I knew this was the right one. True to size, flattering, high quality and gorgeous material.

Not just for men! Great option for women who don't want to wear super short or overly baggy basketball shorts. These shorts are slim and fall right at the knee on me and I'm 5'9. Oh, and the pockets lay flat and don't protrude out like I have found with other Nike basketball shorts.
Just perfect! Classy and fits like a glove. So in love with it!!!
This coat is very beautiful and fits perfectly to size. The style is exactly what I am looking for in a trench coat. It makes me happy when I wear it!

Love Calvin Klien coats all together!!! This jacket is very warm coat and pretty fashionable at the same time. It fits right below the bum area for people who are worried that'll be to short. Its a perfect coat for the winter and its true to size and adult women size not junior size.

Runs big! I am 5'3 and 114 pounds and an xtra small is too big. It also flares out in an A-line from the waist down. It doesn't fit straight like how the model is wearing it. If you like A-line shapes then you'll like this but I find it's not flattering to the figure at all.

Very cute! I got this for my young grandson who loves dinosaurs and he went absolutely nuts for it. He hasn't stopped playing with it yet. We had to fight him into bed because he just wanted to play with this toy.
This is such a great toy and educational also. My grandson just loves it and plays for hours with it!

Love this toy. Got this for my nephew and he loved it. He open it and was so surprised. It comes with all the pieces on the front of the box and he was so excited to open it. Would recommend to anyone looking for a good gift.
He is sooo cuteee. He looks better than I thought he would. Very adorable love this purchase.
Unfortunately, it broke the first time we used it. It was too light, the wind carried it away and it lost contact with the controller and dropped to the ground. Obliterated on the first use.
I love the classic look this sofa has. It's comfortable and just lovely, very happy with my purchase.
Bought this product twice to give it some time and I haven't seen a difference. Not worth it and is overpriced and overhyped

So far we have been loving this security camera system for our house. It is very easy to install and friendly to use even for a not so tech-savvy person like me. Truly a plug and play product. When I opened the package, I was happily surprised by the free SD card that comes with the product (very thoughtful of the designer of the product to include this so users don't have to scramble around the house looking for an SD card). I am also loving the spotlight on the camera. I almost overlooked it at first, but it is so bright that it lights up my driveway beautifully at night! There's also a scheduling function that I use to turn the light on automatically from 8pm to 11:30pm. Highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a home security camera. From the thoughtful designs to the unbeatable price, this is one of my best purchases for our home. Totally worth the money!
Effective and quick! I've used these patches for several years and given them as gifts to my friends.

This drone is super fun to play with. It's a great size and we all love it as a family. It was easy to learn how to use, and I would definitely recommend to anyone looking for a drone for their family.

Decent buy. I bought four of these and they're definitely not made to be used together. One stops fading colors and stays at one color unless I press the button again on the remote. The one next to it is much brighter even though I lowered the dimming. The colors are nice and when used separately they are a great buy when on sale. You get a remote for each but you can save those and only use one on all of them. The timing for fading options are different on each (probably because I'm using different USB chargers with different outputs) so it's hard to get two to switch colors at the same time.
This is my second purchase of this top. It is warm, comfortable snd very soft. It washes well, runs a little small, it is semi-fitted, so I always go up one size for the best fit.
This couch is elegant, comfortable, and stylish. While I am using it in my glam room as an accent piece it is doing more for the room than expected. The delivery service was A1 as well.
Easy to shop. Easy to buy.

This monitor is amazing! It has a crystal clear picture, great resolution! No blur and super quick response time. It was easy to setup and works beautifully! The colors are amazingly clear, vivid, and detailed. It is simple to adjust for your personal viewing angle, and is easy on your eyes. I would recommend this monitor to anyone looking to update your old one. You smiply cannot beat this quality at this price! Highly recommended!

Wearing sunscreen regularly is the best way to prevent lots of skin issues including enlarged pores and wrinkles cause by sun exposure. I find it hard to persuade male members in my family to wear sunscreens, so this moisturizer really helps. It is oilfree and smells nice. Highly recommend it.
This is a great monitor for the price. It easily connected to a DVD player through HDMI and a sound bar through Bluetooth.

Beautiful chairs, they are very comfy as well! When you first sit in them they are on the tougher side but after a few seconds it softens up. I would highly recommend these chairs. Easy to put together - the packaging was supreme and the shipping was super quick! Highly impressed all around!
So far so good! Once you get used to the initial zap it does not hurt. Leaves your skin red for a bit but that's expected. I think it's helping control my breakouts

My skin feels better already after first use. Can't wait to see long term results. Most difficult part was waiting for it to fully charge so I could use it. I've always bought cheaper versions in the past that I thought were really good but this blows everything else I've ever tried away.
The device is very simple to use. It is warm and slide smoothly on my skin. I enjoy the warm and soothing heat. Very relaxing!

I'm very happy with it and so is my husband. It's a very cool jacket and the material does have a bit of that waxed cotton look which is cool (actual wax cotton is a pain to maintain but I digress). A must-have jacket!
This shirt is very soft and cozy. Fits well!
I love the material (cotton). It's perfect for my toddler! I love flannel shirts and I am so happy with the material because it's perfect for babies/kids.

Does this perfume smell good? Yes. However the lasting power is horrible for the price. I would honestly consider making this my go to spring scent if the longevity wasn't so bad. On me it only lasted two hours and most perfumes last between four to five hours on my skin. I bought this because I really like the smell of the original flowerbomb but it's one of my besties signature scents so I think of her whenever I smell it. I thought this would be similar but still have it's own identity but it sadly does not. It is basically the original flowerbomb with vanilla.

I have had several AMAZFIT and after trying some other brands, I always go back to AMAZFIT. On the economic side of smart watches these are reliable, resistant and elegant. ATENTION: The main issue I have noticed is that sometimes when AMAZFITs vibrate, make a buzzz sound and this should not be like that, is a vibration feature not a buzzer.
The product was shipped quickly and it was of extremely high quality. my friend absolutely loved this!

The build is solid with tufted fittings and cushions are strong with air able breathing. I needed one set for my living room and now ordering a second pair as well. The sofas are comfy, with great fabric and very easy to assemble. You will be satisfied with your living room with this one.
Nice colors and fits just right! Glad that it's non-slip and that I'll be able to wash it.
After the first wash the legs shrunk so they now only reach mid-calf on my husband.

I don't think this scent is groundbreaking, but not every scent has to be, does it? I love how simple and elegant this scent is at the same time. I love the vanilla orchid vibe I'm getting from this and it's beautiful. Overall this is a nice balance of floral and sweet (but not full on gourmand) and I really like that. I think this is a versatile scent and great for layering as well.
Good baby shower gift. This coverall is very sweet and nicely made.
Great speaker. Powerful and easy to use. I'm trying to work out how I can turn off the annoying start-up sound.
This fit perfectly and the arm length was exact. Not too short. Very warm and received a lot of compliments.

This product was extremely high quality and great design overall. It is comfortable and suitable for fall/winter season yet it can be so stylish at the same time. I really like the combination of the two styles between puffer jacket on the sides and everything else leather jacket.
It's true to size, fits well, has flattering look with sleeves adding charm to it.
Beautiful dress. Photos cannot capture the beauty of this fabric. LRL has amazing style and this is the dress I selected for my sons wedding. I tried many many dresses and this one is special.

This drone is easy to set up and get started, but hard to control. The 14 age recommendation is definitely correct. I have limited experience with drones (I've only had one other), but I couldn't seem to get the hang of this one. On mine, the forward and backward seemed to be reversed and it didn't seem to matter if I was in compass mode or not. It was also pretty difficult to get it to hover in one spot without drifting pretty bad. I probably need to go through the trim procedure. I didn't test out the two stunt modes as I don't think I'll be taking this outside and it needs to be 10 ft up to perform those. I'm pretty sure this guy would zip off and away on me if I did.

I love the removable and adjustable stand it comes with. I was also surprised by the brightness and throw distance it was capable of, especially being such a small projector. The only issue was that the throw ratio was not listed on the specs or anywhere online, but I eventually was able to get an answer from customer service, the throw ratio being 1'.
I really like this cute set and want to love it, but the quality/thickness of the shirt is not quite what I hoped.

I needed a small pan for eggs because i was tired of cooking eggs for 1 in a large pan. This size is the perfect fit for what i was looking for. The non stick works great and makes it really easy to clean! Kitchen Aid never disappoints.
When it was shipped the pots and pans were scratched on the outside and inside. Poor quality and disappointed.

These products do wonders for your skin!! Clears up acne, leaves skin soft and supple and my skin looks brighter and not as dull. I'm loving this and will purchase again. I've already purchased the same gift set for a few friends!
Exactly what it looked like in the picture. Size and color is perfect. Highly recommend!

I saw a review of this product and had to try it. Within a few days of the first use, stubborn breakouts were drying up and the rest of my skin looks smoother and fresher (I'm mid 50s). I have been using every other day and it hasn't been too drying for my skin. I has some slight “purging” after the first use, but not since. To me, this lactic acid product works better than over the counter retinol products I've tried.
I like them but they really slide bad.
I love how my face smells and feels when I finish my morning routine. Like a beautiful sunrise with a sweet smell of fruit salad.

Very disappointed. Bought these for my son. He's only been wearing them for a couple months and they are tearing at the seams in several areas. They aren't worn thin, nor are they too small. He loves the fit and style but We can't be replacing them every 2 months.
I have always been a fan of the Nike brand. I brought these for wear in my AAU officiating. Nice and comfortable, light, and breathable.
I wasn't a fan. It ran very small and the material felt cheap and thin.
Bought it yesterday when I saw in a store. Shoulders yes are little big for normal size small. Would love if the quality were a little softer, but for the asked price looks very cool.

I have been looking for basic trench for a while. Picked this up on sale & I'm really happy with it. The fit is true to a hair snug, I live in a warm climate so not an issue for me. My arms are longer than average & sleeve is perfect for me. Overall happy with this purchase.

This coat is absolutely beautiful! The color pictured is accurate. My dad said that I looked like a movie star in the coat. (Yes, that's a dad for you!) I would describe it as a dress coat. Certainly not your 'let's go play in the snow coat'. It's very stylish and fun to wear when you need something other than a puffer jacket!
The warmest, trendiest puffer! Love the belted middle, gives you shape and makes the jacket look fitted yet cozy.

This was given to my child for a birthday gift and it was a favorite. The first day, it was played with for about three hours with siblings. It has a control that can move the dinosaur robot. It is combining two kid favorites into one awesome toy. It is a bit small, but that's good for small hands and fine motor skills. It was my child's tenth birthday, and I feel a couple years younger to a teen would appreciate this toy.

My boys were obsessed with this item. It helped them fall asleep and kept them from being around of the dark. The little legs that hold it up broke sooner than i would have expected from my children switching the viewing mode. Now they cant use it unless it is propped up with other items.

I bought my son several of these lego set and have been very impressed with them all. The quality is great and the detail is phenomenal. It is easy to use for a beginner builder and the legos snap together easily. Definitely a must buy!

Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend for Christmas and he loved it! Plush came in great condition and has good detailing to it. If you're a fan of the character and series it's a must buy for any plushie collection.

This jet/plane is awesome easy to fly for the novice and fun to fly for the experience. If windy you need to take off horizontally in 3D then switch to 6g and it flies great. Vertical take off works perfectly and once you get the hang of it there is no need for auto landing. Jet can be very fast and smooth. I would recommend this to anyone that has basic experience in rc flying. When pairing follow the pairing instructions and repeat for a second time to make sure the gyro is perfect then the plane will be perfectly synchronized. Other than that have fun and happy flying!

Fun toy to play with. The battery doesn't not last too long but is fun to play with while it lasts. Would make a great Birthday or Christmas present for a small child. Would recommend to someone with children.

Easily installed and am very satisfied. I really like that the camera and spotlight are both in one compact housing. The spotlight is very bright and helps improve the video quality significantly at night. When the light comes on at night, you can see the colors very clearly. Quite outstanding!

The light is cool, I thought it was going to be two since the picture shows two but that is just on me since I did not read all the description. The light works well, it does not come with an outlet plug but I have plenty anyway. The remote does turn it on, off, different colors, how to change colors too. It can be placed horizontally or vertically. looks nice. Would have liked it to be music sensor too, that would have been a very nice plus. Regardless, looks nice. I have not tried the app, only the remote.

I absolutely love and admire our sofa. The color reflects more of gray-bluish and adds so much character to our living room space. The delivery crew did an amazing job in coming through the door without damaging the walls. They were quite accommodating when I decided to switch the sofa placement and location. My overall experience from purchase, scheduling and delivery exceeded my expectations.

Love the color and size but it is rather uncomfortable. It hurt my back and I tried returning to get a different type but was told I only had 3 days to have returned it. Unfortunately, I traveled for work during that time and when I returned was when I realized how uncomfortable it was so I couldn't return it. If you are the type that love soft couches this may not be for you.
Chair was back ordered, but I always received updates. I appreciate that and love the chair. Well worth the wait.
Love the chairs!! Very comfortable and sturdy. Love how they went with our dinning room table that needed a quick and inexpensive makeover.
